department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Purchase of new SAN storage hardware for Arctic research station.
description: Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS) requires the supply and delivery of new Storage Area Network (SAN) basket of goods (networking and storage hardware) required to implement a Storage Area Network (SAN). The SAN will house unclassified data generated by staff and visiting researchers to CHARS and used to meet the operational requirement to provide computer storage for visiting researchers.
tags: Network Security or Virtual Private Network VPN Management Software
Network Security and Virtual Private Network VPN Equipment Software
Local Area Network LAN Maintenance or Support
